item.title: When Algorithms Mess Up, the Nearest Human Gets the Blame
item.description: When Algorithms Mess Up, the Nearest Human Gets the Blame [ read more ] A look at historical case studies shows us how we handle the liability of automated systems 5 min read Synchronized SGD Outdated? Yoshua Bengio on Hardware-Friendly DL [ read more ] DeepMind’s 2018 AlphaGo Zero requires 300,000 times more computing power than AlexNet did in 2013. With… 7 min read A Leap into the Future: Generative Adversarial Networks [ read more ] Is December 12, 2018, a day the world changed forever?
